body:
Recent changes in master https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/30935 that were pulled into the 1.4 release branch lead to vSphere cloud provider to panic when only a single ESX node is present under a vCenter.

I am in the process of testing and creating a PR for this. 


labels.name: sig/node

title: vSphere Cloud Provider panics in the absence of a cluster
